name: Down To Earth (Mistafixxa069)
description:
Welcome!!!

This cool little game was made for the Hyper Casual Jam #2 with the theme of Perspective Matters and the restriction of No Pixel Art. I'm not sure how I pulled it off but here it is!!!

Instructions:

You control camera's perspective, which controls the gravity of the world.
You can add or subtract the camera angle by 90 degrees using the on screen arrows, the Left and Right keys & A and D keys.
